channel.title: CVE Feed for TEAM JOHNLONG SOFTWARE CO., LTD. -- MAILD Mail Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TEAM JOHNLONG SOFTWARE CO., LTD. -- MAILD Mail Server

item.title: CVE-2022-41675|2024-09-16T18:18:46.176Z -- team%20johnlong%20software%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- maild%20mail%20server
item.description: A remote attacker with general user privilege can inject malicious code in the form content of Raiden MAILD Mail Server website. Other users export form content as CSV file can trigger arbitrary code execution and allow the attacker to perform arbitrary system operation or disrupt service on the user side.
